addTag(uint256,string).notice: Adds a tag to a document the caller owns

createDocument(string,string).notice: Creates a new document for the caller of this function

editTitle(uint256,string).notice: Allow users to edit the title of a document they own

getNumberOfDocuments().notice: Gets the number of documents the caller has uploaded
